name: Jian Yang 0001
content: Jian Yang - Macquarie University View Scopus Profile Jian Yang Professor Professor, School of ComputingCentre for Applied Artificial IntelligenceData Horizons Research CentreFuture Communications Research CentreDirector of Industrial PhD Program (Secondment), School of ComputingEmerging Risks Research Centre https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4408-1952 Phone+61 2 9850 9584Emailjian.yangmq.eduau h-index 4352 Citations 33 h-index Calculated based on number of publications stored in Pure and citations from Scopus 1997 …2025 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyProf Jian Yang is a Co-Director of Data Horizons research Centre and Deputy Director of Applied Artificial Intelligence Research Centre. She received her PhD in Data Integration  from The Australian National University in 1995. Before she joined Macquarie University, she worked as an associate professor at Tilburg University, Netherlands (2000-2003), a senior research scientist at the Division of Mathematical and Information Science, CSIRO, Australia (1998-2000), and as a lecturer at Dept of Computer Science, The Australian Defence Force Academy, University of New South Wales (1993-1998). She has been recognised among the Stanford/Elsevier Top 2% Scientists globally for her career-long impact, spanning from 2019 to 2025.Research interestsProf Yang's current interests are: graph mining; trust, fake news detection, recommendation in social media; fraud detection; data fusion, data driven process analytics; service orineted computing; smart city; aging and aged care. Her research has been supported by various sources: ARC Discovery, ARC Linkage, ARC LIEF, CRCs, Data61 CSIRO CRP, and EU six framework. Recent projects include: trust and spam detection in social media; grand truth discovery in web; fraud detection in finance and insurance; smart city; detection and early prediction for thyroid cancer; data fusion for medical data. She has published papers in top international journals and conferences such as IEEE TKDE, TNNIS, TSC; ACM TOIS, TWeb;  Information Systems, VLDBJ, CACM, VLDB, ICDE, SIGKDD, IJCAI, ICDM, WSDM, NuerIPS, ICDCS, ICSOC, ICWS, CAiSE, CIKM, etc.She is the founding member and steering committee chair of the prime international conference on service oriented computing (ICSOC). She was general chair and program committee chair of several international conferences such as ICSOC and BPM.
